lead_paragraph: The Social Security Administration is about to terminate cash assistance for thousands of refugees who are severely disabled or over the age of 64.
snippet: The Social Security Administration is about to terminate cash assistance for thousands of refugees who are severely disabled or over the age of 64.

headline.main: Many Indigent Refugees to Lose Federal Assistance
headline.print_headline: Many Indigent Refugees to Lose Federal Assistance
headline.sub: All Fled Persecution or Torture but Have Not Become U.S. Citizens;
